resource.name: Fort Lauderdale Part 1 Crime
resource.description:
Part 1 Crime includes the following offenses:

Homicide, Sex Offenses Forcible, Robbery, Aggravated Assault, Vehicle Burglary, Business Burglary, Conveyance Burglary, Hotel/Motel Burglary,Residential Burglary 
School Burglary, Larceny (All), Vehicle Theft, Arson
